issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Resource Manager web ui issue when sorting application by id (with application having id > 9999)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When Job id's exceed 9999, JobHistoryServer is not sorting properly based on the Job ID. It is mixing the jobs having > 9999 with other jobs considering only the first four digits of the job id. The same problem could exist for Job Map tasks and Reduce tasks table as well.


It is similar to the issue YARN-3840 exists for YARN.
fields.summary: JobHistoryServer doesn't sort properly based on Job ID when Job id's exceed 9999

comments.body: [~mohdshahidkhan], I am assigning this issue to you as you have already started working on the same for YARN. Please reassign to me if you can't handle this.
This issue is dependent on YARN-3840, so YARN-3840 must be commited first.

The patch LGTM barring formatting issues.
[~mohdshahidkhan], can you fix the tabs ?
